title: Antivertiginous drug therapy does not hinder the efficacy of individualized vibrotactile neurofeedback training for vestibular rehabilitation - a randomized trial
citation: Basta D, Borsellino L, Ernst A. Antivertiginous drug therapy does not hinder the efficacy of individualized vibrotactile neurofeedback training for vestibular rehabilitation - a randomized trial.  International Journal of Rehabilitation Research 2017;40(4):333-8. CENTRAL    Link to article     PubMed     Google Scholar
exclusion_reason: This RCT did not recruit participants with a diagnosis of PPPD. Instead, it included people with presbyvertigo, unilateral horizontal semicircular canal loss or unilateral saccular disorders.
